references.paper_title: Interpretable Machine Learning: Fundamental Principles and 10 Grand Challenges
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational overview of interpretable machine learning, which is the central theme of the current work.

references.paper_title: Fast Sparse Classification for Generalized Linear and Additive Models
references.reason: This paper introduces the FastSparse algorithm, which is used extensively in this current work for building sparse GAMs.
This is a comprehensive reference on handling missing data, providing essential background for the current research on M-GAMs.
This paper provides a detailed overview of multiple imputation techniques, which are compared against the proposed method.

references.paper_title: The Missing Indicator Method: From Low to High Dimensions
references.reason: This paper explores the use of missingness indicators in prediction, a key aspect of the proposed M-GAM methodology.
